lead_paragraph: The founders of the new Pssst art gallery say they will focus on artists from underrepresented groups.

headline.print_headline: A Nonprofit Gallery Planned for Los Angeles
headline.main: Boyle Heights Gallery Scene in Los Angeles Is Still Growing

snippet: The founders of the new Pssst art gallery say they will focus on artists from underrepresented groups.
abstract: Artists Barnett Cohen and Jules Gimbrone plan to transform Los Angeles warehouse into nonprofit gallery and artist residency Pssst, which will promote diversity in art world.
